unnormalised: **Viral Leher Re Sawara: Nit Ge Bharat Re Oka Do Bes Calak Kan-a?**
normalised: Viral Baha Setej: Tikic Do Bharat Re Chetan Viral Kana?

unnormalised: Namaste, hor ko! Bharat re social media do – Mumbai local lekage, chire din calak kan-a, chire din bheed thakao kan-a, ar chire din ankaah chij urukhok kan-a. Nit Ge oka do viral kan-a uni do bujhao do ankaah do bujuh-a banka lekage next Bollywood dance number oka gharih re hejuh-a. Menkhan hey, uni ge do mojah bujhao-a, ban-a?
normalised: Namaste, hor ko! Bharat ren social media do - noa do Mumbai local gadi leka ge, dinam ge senok kana, dinam ge gidi-gidi, ar dinam ge anahak jinis uthal idiyeda. Tikic do chetan viral kana noa bujhau do jahan leka next Bollywood dance number okon ghari hejok'a, noa agui lagit' leka bujhau'a. Menkhan hey, noa ge to excited banaw akada, baṅ?

unnormalised: Tobe, nit Ge oka trend do eken mit din re ge famous kan-a? Mit chij do ale do nel-le-a do hyper-local content re-yaah shakti. Chandni Chowk re-yaah bes street food nel-hok reel baang-khan Bangalore re auto driver ko sohoh sathi hilarous skits mon-re dhoho tabun-pe. Sacchai do marang-a. Hor ko do bes chohok, sadharan content re do baharaw akana. Unko do nel sanang-a sacha hor ko, sacha halat, juri chabaohok duk-muskil. 2020 re-yaah "Rasode Mein Kaun Tha" meme mone-pe? Pure sona!
normalised: Tehen do chetan trends do miť ñido re sensation banaw' kana? Miť jinis jeleť kana do hyper-local content ren takat. Bhabiyem Chandni Chowk ren sapra ketej street food udub kan'a jahan reels do, ba Bangalore ren auto driver ko saõ setej-setej'ak' katha re hilau'ak' skits. Sacha'i do marang ge. Horko do aḍ ge polish'ak', sadharan content tey hagaw akana. Onko do asol horko, asol halat, ar jodao lagit'ak' sangharsh helej do chan'a. Bar hajar bis (2020) sal ren en "Rasode Mein Kaun Tha" meme do chhetan tahen'a? Asol sona!

unnormalised: Influencer ko do unko do marang buddhi-man kan-a. Unko do eken product dhoho re-yaah baharaw te-ge auri calak-a ar do sacha-re-ge motlob-wali kahani ko banka-da. Udaharan leka te, Prajakta Koli do NGO ko sohoh te mental health re-yaah jagrukta badhao lagit kaam kan-a. Uni kotha do hor ko mon re do mohoroh-a. Ar pahunchok kotha re kathaohok do, Chennai re-yaah mit kuri do carnatic gaan do bes sur te ror-et tahakan-a uni reel mone-pe? Turant ge viral! Ale do uni do 15/08/1947 din sahit badhao-o nel-le-a, ar sab hor ko do share-et tahakan-a.
normalised: Influencers ko do rabeć hõ banaw kana. Onko do product placement khon hõ aḍ besh do senok kana ar asol re mane'ak' kahani banaw' kana. Jemon ko bujhau leka, Prajakta Koli do NGO ko saõ juṛau' kate mental health chetan re bujhau lagit' kamiyeda. En jinis do dãṛe kana. Ar resonance katha do, Chennai ren kuḍi do carnatic seren do besh pitch re seren' kana en reel do chhetan tahen'a? Jaldi ge viral! Abon do noa do pon gel sať (1947) sal re Agar gel gel (15) August ghari' phataw' lekan jeleť keda, ar horko do sabhage share kan'a.

unnormalised: Ar, mit bes challenge re-yaah shakti do aloh bon hijing-a! "Kiki Challenge" mone-pe? Thik-a, uni specific do ban-a, menkhan challenge ko, khas kore India re-yaah alag-ge twist sohoh challenge ko do nit ho calak kan-a. Nit Ge oka calak kan-a, uni do inj do 11:00 bajah din pahil nel-le-a – uni do purana Raj Kapoor film re-yaah iconic scene ko do abar bankaohok kan-a. Genius!
normalised: Ar, miť besh challenge ren takat do alom hirin'a! Kiki Challenge do chhetan tahen'a? Thik ge, hoĕ, en khas ge do baṅ, menkhan challenges, khas kar ke je Bharotiyoyak' alag twist saõ, onko do eto hõ trending ge. Tikic do jahan do chalaw' kana, ñui do en do tikic seleb (11) baje ghari' ol-otaw' lekan jeleť keda – noa do puraṇ Raj Kapoor film ko ren khas scene ko dohṛa banaw lagit'ak' kana. Marang budhi!

unnormalised: Mukhya sikhon? Sacha thakao-pe, juri-chabaohok thakao-pe, ar Bharat re-yaah nabj re-ge sahit chij ko do dhoho-pe. Aapon audience do chinhao-pe (Kolkata, Lucknow baang-khan jetah nagar re-ge unko do thakao-a). Aisih content bankaoh-pe oka do kathaow-a ar mon re-yaah bhabna uruk-a. Ar chikae do? Maybe do Diwali 24/10/2024 din te do nahaag viral sensation do ne-ge thakao-a. Shubh Laabh!
normalised: Mukya katha do? Sacha banaw'me, jodao lagit'ak' banaw'me, ar Bharat ren naḍi do saõ juṛau'me. Apnar audience do bujhau'me (onko do Kolkata, Lucknow ba itar sahar re doho ko tahen kan'a). Content banaw'me je katha do uṭhau'a ar bhavna do ol-otaw'a. Ar okoe do bujhau'a? Janiñ abon do bar hajar pon gel (2024) sal re October bar gel pon (24) tarikh Diwali ghari' next viral sensation banaw'a. Shubh Laabh!
